General.Name: Roebuck Food Group PLC
General.Description: Roebuck Food Group plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the protein and product sourcing, and dairy farming business in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It also offers meat, fish, and plant-based ingredients to food manufacturing and wholesale companies; and engages in investment business. The company was formerly known as Norish Plc and changed its name to Roebuck Food Group plc in November 2021. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Newry, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 7 Carrivekeeney Road, Newry, United Kingdom, BR35 7LU
